attributes.action: Stop bottom trawling on our ocean floor and unnecessary over fishing.
attributes.additional_details: After watching David Attenborough's documentary Ocean with David Attenborough more has to be done 30% is not enough. Ban bottom trawling.
attributes.background: Put a stop to the needless scraping of our ocean floors, speeding up climate change and needless death of multiple different eco systems and marine life.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban Trawling in All Marine Protected Areas (MPAs) in UK waters
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727634
